name: Cash Tree
description:
With the free Cash Tree app you can simply grow your own money. Take care of your own Cash Tree which grows beautiful green bills instead of leaves!

It's very simple: Just grab all the falling money till it reaches the ground. The falling speed increases with each level. But be careful, do not catch a stone or branch because this will decrease your balance.

What are you waiting for? Get the free Cash Tree App now, because It's time for Cash!

For more info, simply go to www.qp-king.com or write to us with questions, suggestions, improvements and criticism at info@qp-king.com.
